typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Client ID} as string,
		Dealer as string,
		{Cust ID} as string,
		Title as string,
		forename as string,
		Surname as string,
		email as string,
		{home phone} as string,
		mobile as string,
		{add 1} as string,
		{add 2} as string,
		{add 3} as string,
		{add 4} as string,
		postcode as string,
		{New or Used} as string,
		type as string,
		{Veh Magic} as string,
		{stock no} as string,
		chassis as string,
		{reg no} as string,
		{reg date} as date,
		{date in stock} as date,
		{CAP VIN} as string,
		{CAP code} as string,
		make as string,
		model as string,
		derivative as string,
		{engine size} as string,
		bodystyle as string,
		mileage as string,
		fuel as string,
		transmission as string,
		{generic colour} as string,
		{specific colour} as string,
		doors as string,
		SIV as string,
		{sale date} as date,
		{inv number} as string,
		{sales exec} as string,
		{full inv value} as string,
		paint as string,
		warr as string,
		GAP as string,
		Acc as string,
		recon as string,
		{Finance commission} as string,
		profit as string,
		{Sale type} as string,
		PX1 as string,
		PX2 as string,
		PX3 as string,
		Source as string,
		{Model Analysis Code} as string,
		Purchaser as string,
		{Supplier Name} as string,
		{Purchase Invoice Date} as date,
		{Available Date} as date,
		{Accessory Profit} as string,
		{Paint Profit} as string,
		{Warr Profit} as string,
		{Gap Profit} as string,
		{Other Profit} as string,
		{Volume Bonus} as string,
		Bonus as string,
		{RFL Profit} as string,
		{Metal Profit} as string,
		{Vehicle Invoice Value} as string,
		{Delivery Date} as date,
		{Sales Account ID} as string,
		{Sales Account Name} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy']) ~> PeterVardyDetailedSales
PeterVardyDetailedSales derive({Cust ID} = trim({Cust ID})) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ClientID as integer,
		Dealer as string,
		CustId as string,
		Title as string,
		Forename as string,
		Surname as string,
		Email as string,
		HomePhone as string,
		Mobile as string,
		Add1 as string,
		Add2 as string,
		Add3 as string,
		Add4 as string,
		Postcode as string,
		NewOrUsed as string,
		Type as string,
		VehMagic as string,
		StockNo as string,
		Chassis as string,
		RegistrationNo as string,
		RegistrationDate as date,
		DateInStock as date,
		CapVin as string,
		CapCode as string,
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Derivative as string,
		EngineSize as string,
		Bodystyle as string,
		Mileage as integer,
		Fuel as string,
		Transmission as string,
		GenericColour as string,
		SpecificColour as string,
		Doors as string,
		Siv as double,
		SaleDate as date,
		InvNumber as integer,
		SalesExec as string,
		FullInvValue as double,
		Paint as double,
		Warr as double,
		Gap as double,
		Acc as double,
		Recon as double,
		FinanceCommission as double,
		Profit as double,
		SaleType as string,
		Px1 as string,
		Px2 as string,
		Px3 as string,
		Source as string,
		ModelAnalysisCode as string,
		Purchaser as string,
		SupplierName as string,
		PurchaseInvoiceDate as date,
		AvailableDate as date,
		AccessoryProfit as double,
		PaintProfit as double,
		WarrProfit as double,
		GapProfit as double,
		OtherProfit as double,
		VolumeBonus as double,
		Bonus as double,
		RflProfit as double,
		MetalProfit as double,
		VehicleInvoiceValue as double,
		DeliveryDate as date,
		SalesAccountID as string,
		SalesAccountName as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['truncate table dbo.DMSVehicleSales_Older'],
	postSQLs:['update dbo.DMSVehicleSales_Older set ClientID = 10000 where ClientID is null'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Dealer,
		CustId = {Cust ID},
		Title,
		Forename = forename,
		Surname,
		Email = email,
		HomePhone = {home phone},
		Mobile = mobile,
		Add1 = {add 1},
		Add2 = {add 2},
		Add3 = {add 3},
		Add4 = {add 4},
		Postcode = postcode,
		NewOrUsed = {New or Used},
		Type = type,
		VehMagic = {Veh Magic},
		StockNo = {stock no},
		Chassis = chassis,
		RegistrationNo = {reg no},
		RegistrationDate = {reg date},
		DateInStock = {date in stock},
		CapVin = {CAP VIN},
		CapCode = {CAP code},
		Make = make,
		Model = model,
		Derivative = derivative,
		EngineSize = {engine size},
		Bodystyle = bodystyle,
		Mileage = mileage,
		Fuel = fuel,
		Transmission = transmission,
		GenericColour = {generic colour},
		SpecificColour = {specific colour},
		Doors = doors,
		Siv = SIV,
		SaleDate = {sale date},
		InvNumber = {inv number},
		SalesExec = {sales exec},
		FullInvValue = {full inv value},
		Paint = paint,
		Warr = warr,
		Gap = GAP,
		Acc,
		Recon = recon,
		FinanceCommission = {Finance commission},
		Profit = profit,
		SaleType = {Sale type},
		Px1 = PX1,
		Px2 = PX2,
		Px3 = PX3,
		Source,
		ModelAnalysisCode = {Model Analysis Code},
		Purchaser,
		SupplierName = {Supplier Name},
		PurchaseInvoiceDate = {Purchase Invoice Date},
		AvailableDate = {Available Date},
		AccessoryProfit = {Accessory Profit},
		PaintProfit = {Paint Profit},
		WarrProfit = {Warr Profit},
		GapProfit = {Gap Profit},
		OtherProfit = {Other Profit},
		VolumeBonus = {Volume Bonus},
		Bonus,
		RflProfit = {RFL Profit},
		MetalProfit = {Metal Profit},
		VehicleInvoiceValue = {Vehicle Invoice Value},
		DeliveryDate = {Delivery Date},
		ClientID = {Client ID},
		SalesAccountID = {Sales Account ID},
		SalesAccountName = {Sales Account Name}
	)) ~> SQLDMSDetailedSales
